# in-silico-PCR
This program takes a target DNA sequence and two primers sequences as an input.

Output is :

* The number and position of homologous sequences in the target sequence for each primer
* If the two primers match the target sequence at only one position, additional output is length of amplicon, sequence of amplicon and position of amplicon on target sequence

__author__ = "St√©phane Lolignier"

__contact__ = "fanou63@hotmail.com"

This is my first Python program. Suggestions for improvement are welcome !



The following sequences can be used as positive control :

target =
""

primerF = "CACACGGAGTTTCCTCCCTA"

primerR = "TCTTCAGGTCTGCCAACAGG"
